item.title: India's Modi invited to meet with Trump next week, White House official says
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has invited Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to visit the White House next week.

item.title: Trump pauses tariffs on Canada imports for 30 days after doing the same for Mexico
item.description: Trump agreed to delay tariffs on Canada and Mexico after their leaders agreed to measures to stop the flow of the opioid fentanyl into the U.S.

item.title: Trump pauses Mexico tariffs for one month after agreement on border troops
item.description: President Donald Trump over the weekend said he was imposing 25% tariffs on goods imported from Mexico and Canada, and a 10% tariff on goods from Chin...

item.title: EU leaders meet to talk defense but Trump and his tariffs loom large
item.description: European leaders are gathering to discuss defense â€” but the latest moves by U.S. President Donald Trump will loom large over the meeting.

item.title: Trump slaps tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing ahead with long-threatened import tariffs on goods from Canada, Mexico and China.
